sqlMap.select:
SELECT ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY, DISPLAYORDERONE, DISPLAYORDERTWO, ZDCUSTMANAGER, NVL(SUM("'01'_FZ"),0) FZONE, NVL(SUM("'01'_FM"),0) FMONE, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'01'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'01'_A"),SUM("'01'_A")),0) ZHGPDTIMEONE, NVL(SUM("'02'_FZ"),0) FZTWO, NVL(SUM("'02'_FM"),0) FMTWO, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'02'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'02'_A"),SUM("'02'_A")),0) ZHGPDTIMETWO, NVL(SUM("'03'_FZ"),0) FZTHREE, NVL(SUM("'03'_FM"),0) FMTHREE, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'03'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'03'_A"),SUM("'03'_A")),0) ZHGPDTIMETHREE, NVL(SUM("'04'_FZ"),0) FZFOUR, NVL(SUM("'04'_FM"),0) FMFOUR, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'04'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'04'_A"),SUM("'04'_A")),0) REVIEWAPPROVALONETIME, NVL(SUM("'05'_FZ"),0) FZFIVE, NVL(SUM("'05'_FM"),0) FMFIVE, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'05'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'05'_A"),SUM("'05'_A")),0) REVIEWAPPROVALTWOTIME, NVL(SUM("'06'_FZ"),0) FZSIX, NVL(SUM("'06'_FM"),0) FMSIX, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'06'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'06'_A"),SUM("'06'_A")),0) REVIEWAPPROVALTHREEORMORETIME, NVL(SUM("'07'_FZ"),0) FZSEVEN, NVL(SUM("'07'_FM"),0) FMSEVEN, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'07'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'07'_A"),SUM("'07'_A")),0) ALLPROCESSTIMEONE, NVL(SUM("'08'_FZ"),0) FZEIGHT, NVL(SUM("'08'_FM"),0) FMEIGHT, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'08'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'08'_A"),SUM("'08'_A")),0) ALLPROCESSTIMETWO, NVL(SUM("'09'_FZ"),0) FZNINE, NVL(SUM("'09'_FM"),0) FMNINE, NVL(DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'09'_A"), 1, 1),'.',0 || SUM("'09'_A"),SUM("'09'_A")),0) ZLWZHAPPROVALTIME FROM (SELECT ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY, ZDCUSTMANAGER, t.displayorderone, t.displayordertwo, t.TIMELIMITTYPE, SUM(WORKTIME) AA, COUNT(*) BB, round(nvl(SUM(worktime), 0) /count(*),2) worktime FROM process_UsedTime_Report t WHERE 1 = 1 and t.worktime>0 AND T.INSERTTIME = (SELECT MAX(g.INSERTTIME) FROM process_UsedTime_Report g)
T.REPORTTIME>=#repTimeStart#
T.REPORTTIME <=(#repTimeEnd#)
T.orgCodeOne='$orgCodeOne$'
T.orgCodeTwo='$orgCodeTwo$'
T.orgCodeTwo in(select orgcode from om_organization start with orgcode='$defaultOrgcode$' connect by prior orgid = parentorgid)
T.ONECATEGORY in ($oneCategory$)
T.LOANCATEGORY in ($loanCategory$)
t.zdCustManager like '%$zdCustManager$%'
t.FLOWID in (select hh.flow_id from ( select t.flow_id, nvl(min(t.operater_date), 0) operater_date from T_APPROVE_OPNINION_GP t where (t.operator_type = '提交发起合同预审' or t.operator_type = '结束') group by flow_id ) hh where hh.operater_date>='$sppTimeStart$' )
t.FLOWID in (select hh.flow_id from ( select t.flow_id, nvl(min(t.operater_date), 0) operater_date from T_APPROVE_OPNINION_GP t where (t.operator_type = '提交发起合同预审' or t.operator_type = '结束') group by flow_id ) hh where hh.operater_date<='$sppTimeEnd$' )
t.FLOWID in (select hh.flow_id from ( select t.flow_id, nvl(min(t.operater_date), 0) operater_date from T_APPROVE_OPNINION_GP t where (t.operator_type = '提交发起合同预审' or t.operator_type = '结束') group by flow_id ) hh where hh.operater_date>='$sppTimeStart$' and hh.operater_date<='$sppTimeEnd$'
)
t.FLOWID in (select distinct a.flow_id from T_APPROVE_OPNINION_GP a where a.operator_type = '提交审查一' and a.next_opr_name like '%$scName$%' )
t.FLOWID in (select distinct a.flow_id from T_APPROVE_OPNINION_GP a where a.operator_type = '提交审批一' and a.next_opr_name like '%$spName$%' )
GROUP BY ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY, ZDCUSTMANAGER, displayorderone, displayordertwo, TIMELIMITTYPE) PIVOT(SUM(worktime) A,SUM(AA) FZ,SUM(BB) FM FOR TIMELIMITTYPE IN('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '06', '07', '08', '09')) GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY,ZDCUSTMANAGER,displayorderone,displayordertwo, "'01'_A", "'02'_A", "'03'_A", "'04'_A", "'05'_A", "'06'_A", "'07'_A", "'08'_A", "'09'_A")) order by DISPLAYORDERONE,DISPLAYORDERTWO
select to_char(to_date(max(t.inserttime), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as update_time from process_UsedTime_Report t
